import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"更新日志流"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/update_log_stream/{id}"} context={"endpoint"} />

更新该部署中现有的日志流。省略某个字段以保留其现有值，使用 `null` 来清除该字段的值。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"请求"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"要更新的日志流的 id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"请求体"} body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"oneOf":[{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"ddApiKey":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"用于认证的 Datadog API key。"},"ddTags":{"type":["array","null"],"items":{"type":"string"},"description":"可选的以逗号分隔的标签列表。这些标签会通过 `ddtags` 字段在每个日志事件中发送到 Datadog。"},"service":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"在 Datadog 中作为特殊标签使用的服务名称。"},"siteLocation":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"description":"你的 Datadog 部署所在的区域。","type":"string","enum":["US1","US3","US5","EU","US1_FED","AP1"],"title":"DatadogSiteLocation"}]}},"title":"UpdateDatadogSinkArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["datadog"]}}}],"title":"Datadog"},{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"format":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"description":"Webhook 负载的格式。JSONL 会在请求体中按行发送一个对象，JSON 则在每个请求中发送一个数组。","type":"string","enum":["json","jsonl"],"title":"WebhookFormat"}]},"url":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"用于接收日志的 URL。"}},"title":"UpdateWebhookSinkArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["webhook"]}}}],"title":"Webhook"},{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"apiKey":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"用于认证的 Axiom API key。"},"attributes":{"type":["array","null"],"items":{"type":"object","required":["key","value"],"properties":{"key":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AxiomAttribute"},"description":"可选的属性列表。这些是发送到 Axiom 的每个日志事件中的额外字段和值。"},"datasetName":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Axiom 中数据集的名称。日志会发送到该数据集。"},"ingestUrl":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Axiom 的可选数据接收端点。"}},"title":"UpdateAxiomSinkArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["axiom"]}}}],"title":"Axiom"},{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"dsn":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"用于路由异常的 Sentry Data Source Name (DSN)。"},"tags":{"type":["object","null"],"description":"要添加到所有路由到 Sentry 的事件上的标签。","additionalProperties":{"type":"string"},"propertyNames":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"UpdateSentrySinkArgs"},{"type":"object","required":["logStreamType"],"properties":{"logStreamType":{"type":"string","enum":["sentry"]}}}],"title":"Sentry"}],"title":"UpdateLogStreamArgs"}}},"required":true}} />

<StatusCodes id={undefined} label={undefined} responses={{"200":{"description":""}}} />
